title: Cherry tomatoes stuffed with goat's cheese and prosciutto

ingredients.content: 80 g dry-cured ham, in slices (e.g. Prosciutto)
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Cut tops off cocktail tomatoes and use a teaspoon to carefully hollow out. Level bottoms of tomatoes to ensure they stand firmly on serving platter. Turn tomatoes upside down to drain on a paper towel.
Place ham in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add goat’s cream cheese, ricotta, salt and pepper and stir  <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Season to taste.
Fill tomatoes with cheese and ham mixture and chill. Remove stuffed tomatoes from fridge approx. 30 minutes before serving and arrange on a platter.

hintsAndTricks: If available, yellow cocktail tomatoes go very nicely with the red tomatoes.
The tomatoes can be stuffed 3–4 hours in advance.
Any leftover cheese and ham mixture can be used in sandwiches or for bruschetta or crostini.
